title: Noncommutative Algebra Examples
description:
Comprehensive examples of noncommutative algebra in MathHook covering
quantum mechanics, matrix algebra, and quaternion rotations.

code.python:
from sympy.physics.quantum import Operator, Commutator

x = Operator('x')
p = Operator('p')

# Commutator
comm = Commutator(x, p)
# Result: I*hbar (in quantum mechanics)

examples.title: Matrix Equation Left Division
examples.explanation: Solve A*X = B using left division X = A^(-1)*B

code.python:
from sympy import symbols, MatrixSymbol, solve, Eq

A = MatrixSymbol('A', n, n)
X = MatrixSymbol('X', n, n)
B = MatrixSymbol('B', n, n)

# Solve A*X = B
equation = Eq(A*X, B)
solution = solve(equation, X)
# Returns: X = A^(-1)*B

examples.title: Quaternion Multiplication
examples.explanation: Noncommutative quaternion basis multiplication i*j = k, j*i = -k

code.python:
from sympy.algebras.quaternion import Quaternion

i = Quaternion(0, 1, 0, 0)
j = Quaternion(0, 0, 1, 0)
k = Quaternion(0, 0, 0, 1)

# Verify: i*j = k
assert i * j == k

# Verify: j*i = -k (noncommutative!)
assert j * i == -k
